system.effect: The blast causes a nasty compound fracture in the target's leg. Until the target receives medical attention, reduce his Movement by half (rounding up), and he cannot use the Run or Charge actions.

description.value:
Energy Damage to Leg (Severity 4)

The blast causes a nasty compound fracture in the target's leg. Until the target receives medical attention, reduce his Movement by half (rounding up), and he cannot use the Run or Charge actions.
